version_description:
-Performance and usability improvements
-Reduced file size for video export

Dear Pic2Comic users and upcoming Digital Artists,

It has been some time since we launched our last update. We used this time to work hard to bring you new features, improve the performance and add more languages, so that you have even more joy creating your Digital Masterpieces.

Pic2Comic goes Clip2Comic — the video feature is now available on all iOS devices that are equal to, or better than the iPhone 4S. The new App title reflects this. (Please note that in-app video recording is not supported in iOS 7. However, videos can be loaded from the library on all platforms.)

Clip2Comic introduces the following new features and improvements:

• Videos can now be tooned on every iOS device starting with the iPhone 4S. (Please note that on older devices, such as iPhone 4S and iPhone 5, we only support video export with reduced resolution.)
• You can now load already existing videos from your photo and video library.
• We reworked the video workflow, so that you can modify the comic style after video recording.
• We improved the visual quality of the video filters and added a black-and-white version of the comic and detail filter.
• We drastically improved the performance of the video processing.
• Clip2Comic has been localised to support Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Polish, Hindi, Turkish.

We hope you like the new version of Clip2Comic. We are looking forward to your feedback.

Best,
Your Digital Masterpieces Team

• fixed loading and processing of external videos (not recorded with the device)
• significantly reduced the app’s size
• stability improvements

• You want to create wonderful and unique gifts for your friends and family or exhibit your digital masterpieces? No problem! With the new version you can directly print and ship buttons, polaroids, canvases, iPhone cases and t-shirts in a glimpse of an eye. Just check out the new option on the share screen.
• To stay tuned and get updates on discounts, new features and events we added push-notifications.
• To get the best out of your new iPhone or iPad we optimized Clip2Comic for iOS 9.0.

• On newer devices your videos will now be saved directly as toon—no post-processing needed
• New engine for video processing for better quality and performance
• New app icon for a fresh look
• No more push notifications—we didn't send any anyways

▸ Simple and Easy-to-Use Interface: Clip2Comic was completely redesigned
▸ State-of-the-Art Filtering Techniques: Get even better results with our improved filters
▸ Live Preview Camera: Open the camera to see the world around you as a cartoon. Swipe to select a filter and compare different styles
▸ Retouch Tools: Draw with your finger or Apple Pencil to edit parts of your picture
▸ Improved Deformation Tool: Use your finger to create caricatures. We’ve added deformation presets to refine, reshape and bloat the picture
▸ Export high-quality, high-resolution results
▸ Order your favorite artwork on canvas with our integrated print shop

▸ Fixed a crash on the camera screen on older devices

In Clip2Comic 3.0 we introduce a lot of new cool features for you:
• A new Poster effect that combines comic strokes with a highlight colour
• Change the highlight colour and amount of the Poster style at your will
• The ability to precisely adjust all aspects of the comic effects with sliders

We also introduce a new subscription model:
All premium features that were separate In-App Purchases before are now unlocked with a single subscription. There is also the option of a single lifetime purchase that unlocks all current and future premium features forever.
Note that you will still be able to access the features you already bought in a previous version of Clip2Comic, even without an active subscription.
